DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , randomize , single blind , concurrent control , multi-center study . Patients present symptom acute ischemic stroke evidence large vessel ( 2.5mm great diameter ) occlusion cerebral circulation assign either Penumbra System Separator 3D Penumbra System without Separator 3D . Each treat patient follow assessed 3 month randomization . Up 230 evaluable patient 50 center present acute ischemic stroke vessel accessible Penumbra Separator 3D System revascularization within 8 hour symptom onset . The hypothesis test safety effectiveness Penumbra System Separator 3D revascularization large vessel occlusion inferior Penumbra System alone .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized , Concurrent Controlled Trial Assess Safety Effectiveness Separator 3D Component Penumbra System Revascularization Large Vessel Occlusion Acute Ischemic Stroke
